import React, {useContext} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { FaHeart } from "react-icons/fa"; import { AuthContext } from '../store/context/AuthContext'; import axios from 'axios'; const MovieItem=({movie})=>{ const {user}=useContext(AuthContext) const addToFavourites=(data)=>{ axios.put('api/users/:id') } return (
{user&& addToFavourites(movie)}/>}

{movie.original_title}

{director}

{movie.overview} More
Rank: <>{movie.vote_average}
Release Date: {movie.release_date}
) } export default MovieItem
